features: The Farmacy Way: Our goal is simple. We want to bring out the best version of your radiant self with the best possible, naturally derived ingredients. Each women's skincare and beauty product we craft uses cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients that Mother Nature has been so kind as to provide for us.

Gentle Cleanser: This face cleanser is formulated with naturally derived ingredients, including coconut, sugar and amino acids, to remove excess oil, impurities and makeup. free of any harsh ingredients, it has a ph level of 5.6 and is safe for all skin types. an ideal addition to any daily skin care regimen for dry, sensitive skin.

Lock In Moisture: Our proprietary honey is full of potent natural antioxidants to help maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier, leaving your skin feeling supple and strokable. this special honey is made exclusively by bees that live on the farmacy farm!
Versatile: The Daily Face Cleanser Works Almost As Hard As You Do. Clean Bee Simultaneously Acts As A Gentle Cleanser, Makeup Remover, And Moisturizer.
How To Use: Apply The Cleaner To Wet Skin And Massage On Face In A Circular Motion. Rinse With Warm Water. Use Daily Morning Or Night. Twist Pump To Lock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so I recently tried out this new face soap, and let me tell you, it's pretty amazing! First off, it does a fantastic job of cleaning my skin without leaving it feeling dry or tight like some other soaps do. Plus, it has this refreshing scent that I love. After using it for a few days, I noticed my skin looked brighter and felt smoother. I'm definitely sticking with this one for my skincare routine. Highly recommend giving it a try if you're looking for a game-changer for your face wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super nice cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I love that this cleanser feels soft and leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated (not oily). Smells nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Face Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This is the best face cleanser. It’s my go-to product and brand. I have combination skin, and it always leaves my face feeling gentle. There are no strong scent to it which is also a plus. You also don’t need to use more than one pump, it’s more than enough. Worth the price. Last a long time. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderfully pleasant scent, great cleanser, and noticeable results!
reviews.reviewText: I first heard about this product after seeing it around on a couple model's instagram pages and decided to try it as I was in the neighborhood for a new gentle cleanser that I can use morning and night when my face just needs to lather away to start the day or prime myself for a good night's sleep. I'm typically VERY hesitant about beauty products that I see being hyped by instagram baddies that claim their good skin is due to a certain product because you never know if they're being paid to promote the product without actually believing in it, or their good skin is the result of other beauty practices they have that we aren't privy to see ( most often expensive spa treatments ). But I decided to take a chance on this product and I am quite surprised at how much of a fit this is for my skin!I have combination skin with a mildly oily t-zone and am typically not prone to breaking out in pimples, though I'm so in-tune with my skin that I can usually tell if stress or oils on my face will cause a breakout at least a day in advance. If I don't pre-treat my skin, my prediction will almost always come true, and the next day I would have to do a treatment to handle any blemishes on my face. While this product isn't especially made to prevent acne breakouts or particularly claim to do so, it works for me when my intuition tells me to clean or pamper my face to prevent it from acting out like an unruly child and causing me trouble the following day. Aside from this, the scent is probably one of my favorite things about it; I'm usually not a fan of scents in my cleansers as I feel they add something unnecessary when you're supposed to be taking stuff AWAY from your face, but the clean bee cleanser is so gentle that the scent is nothing more than just a pleasant bonus tacked on to something so routine in my day that it almost feels like it's a luxury. If I could compare it to something, it would probably be how you think your breath smells after taking a couple ricola honey and herb cough drops, which I never thought I would enjoy having on my face.All in all, it's a very pleasant cleanser if you're looking for something gentle to treat your skin-- I personally use it as my main cleanser now after having used it for 6 days and noticed an increased brightness in my skin, something that is probably due to the hyaluronic acid in its formula, but I do follow an extensive 12 step korean beauty routine that involves several other products with hyaluronic acid as well. Whether they complement each other or the results are purely because of this product ( something I feel may be the case as I imagine that the acid would more penetrate my face while I'm using my spin brush ) is something I'm not entirely sure of at the moment, but would recommend this to people who are in the process of looking for a nice, gentle cleanser to add to their routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am completely in love with the whole Farmacy line! The face wash is gentle so it doesn’t dry out my skin. If you’re a woman 50+ years, I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant smell. Good cleaning of my makeup, but does feel depleting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin and this product is perfect for me. It doesn't not dry out my skin leaving it very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face wash i’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: This is the best face wash. I love how gentle it is, it feels clean, but doesn’t strip your skin. I never have breakouts, and i wouldn’t change if I was paid to do so. I love it.

Love this stuff!! Gentle on skin. Leaves my skin refreshed and soft feeling every time. I will often use it moring and night. Nice, light scent and feels clean on the skin after every use.I also highly recommend their other ‘Clean Green’ facial cleanser with moringa and Papaya when I want something to take off the oil, sweat and sunscreen on a hot summer day. Tip: keep it in the fridge for an extra cool, refreshing cleanse in the morning or at night. It will become your favourite summer cleanser!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the way my skin feels
reviews.reviewText: This product was a great find. Not only are the ingredients clean, but my skin loves it! I have been using this daily for the last couple weeks and have noticed my skin is much softer. I usually have sensitive skin as well and many cleansers cause me to break out. This one does not. I personally love the smell, though I can see it not being everyone's cup of tea. Smell is sweet but slightly medicinal.

This is my absolute favourite face wash. Cleans off all makeup without stripping it so it’s dry and tight after. I’ve been using this for 6 years now.One of the best brands and way faster to get then ordering from Sephora. 😊

reviews.reviewTitle: Stripped my skin dry - I am VERY sensitive though...
reviews.reviewText: I love some of Farmacy's products but sadly this one just stripped my skin. It was recommended by the company so I didn't read the fine print that it foams, which I've yet to find a foaming wash that doesn't take of any skin barrier I have. I liked the ingredients and wish I could use it but sadly no luck! Wish I picked up the moisturizer instead on Prime day!

I’m so confused about the other reviews, it’s as though I got something different. The smell was chemical smelling, not natural. It did not do much for my face, and was hard to wash off. Really expensive for what felt and smelled like Dial hand soap.
